name: unvrs
description: A particle engine I've always wanted to write.

scripts.package: mkdir -p dist && browserify lib/index.js --standalone unvrs > dist/unvrs.js
scripts.dev: chokidar --initial "src/**/*.js" "test/**/*.js" -c "npm run lint -s && npm run test -s"
scripts.prepublish: npm run transpile && npm run package
